{"id":1279692140,"question_id":345,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1717689774,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1279692140/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String reverseVowels(String s) {\n        String vowels = \"AEIOUaeiou\";\n        char[] chars = s.toCharArray();\n        // System.out.println(chars[0] == 'h');\n        for (int left = 0, right = chars.length-1; left < right; ) {\n            while (vowels.indexOf(chars[left]) == -1) {\n                left++;\n                if (left >= right) {\n                    // System.out.println(\"break\");\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n\n            while (vowels.indexOf(chars[right]) == -1) {\n                right--;\n                if (left >= right) {\n                    // System.out.println(\"break\");\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n\n            // System.out.println(\"\" + chars[left] + \" vs \" + chars[right]);\n\n            if (left < right) {\n                char c = chars[left];\n                chars[left] = chars[right];\n                chars[right] = c;\n                left++;\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return new String(chars);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
